attributes.action: If a Public Vote is held it should include the option 'Remain in the EU'.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to Revoke Article 50 passed 6 million signatures
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584
Debates in the House of Commons and Westminster Hall on 1st April included much support for a Confirmatory People's Vote
attributes.background: Parliament is considering holding a Confirmatory Public Vote. Voters are now well informed about Brexit. Many want to exercise their democratic choice to remain - so sign now.
